Question: Find top 20 values in descendent order of a big map: :here's m codeInteger max = Collections.max(map.values());int count = 20;while(count>0){    for (Map.Entry<String, Integer> e : map.entrySet())        if(e.getValue() == max)        {            System.out.println(e.getKey() + "occurs" + e.getValue() + "times");            count--;        }        max--;}This program runs in theta of n square time complexity. Is there a better way to display entries in the max which have top 20 maximum values in descending order?
Please using this api: Iterator.next.
